traits.label: nodes
traits.name: :nodes
traits.desc: The array of nodes that designates the tree structure

traits.label: node-key
traits.name: :node-key
traits.desc: The property name of each node object that holds a unique node id

traits.label: label-key
traits.name: :label-key
traits.desc: The property name of each node object that holds the label of the node

traits.label: children-key
traits.name: :children-key
traits.desc: The property name of each node object that holds the list of children of the node

traits.label: no-connectors
traits.name: :no-connectors
traits.desc: Do not display the connector lines between nodes

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: control-color
traits.name: :control-color
traits.desc: Color name for controls (like checkboxes) from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: text-color
traits.name: :text-color
traits.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: selected-color
traits.name: :selected-color
traits.desc: Color name for selected nodes (from the Quasar Color Palette)

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; occupies less space

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: tick-strategy
traits.name: :tick-strategy
traits.desc: The type of strategy to use for the selection of the nodes

traits.label: ticked
traits.name: :ticked
traits.desc: Keys of nodes that are ticked

traits.label: expanded
traits.name: :expanded
traits.desc: Keys of nodes that are expanded

traits.label: selected
traits.name: :selected
traits.desc: Key of node currently selected

traits.label: no-selection-unset
traits.name: :no-selection-unset
traits.desc: Do not allow un-selection when clicking currently selected node

traits.label: default-expand-all
traits.name: :default-expand-all
traits.desc: Allow the tree to have all its branches expanded, when first rendered

traits.label: accordion
traits.name: :accordion
traits.desc: Allows the tree to be set in accordion mode

traits.label: filter
traits.name: :filter
traits.desc: The text value to be used for filtering nodes

traits.label: filter-method
traits.name: :filter-method
traits.desc: The function to use to filter the tree nodes; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

traits.label: duration
traits.name: :duration
traits.desc: Toggle animation duration (in milliseconds)

traits.label: no-nodes-label
traits.name: :no-nodes-label
traits.desc: Override default such label for when no nodes are available

traits.label: no-results-label
traits.name: :no-results-label
traits.desc: Override default such label for when no nodes are available due to filtering
